snippet.title: Bot Hunter - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Bot Hunter is a fast-paced roguelite shooter with modular weapons. Play as a vacuum cleaner bounty hunter. Use color theory to clean the galaxy of bot scum and collect rewards to pay your bills.

Check out Bot Hunter on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2864420/Bot_Hunter/

Release date: April 7th 2025

Find us on:
https://discord.gg/XPvPjzERBF
https://www.instagram.com/forgeofwonders/
https://www.tiktok.com/@forgeofwonders/
https://x.com/forgeofwonders

Music: @FASSounds
